name: This Is Not Chess
description:
This Is Not Chess is a turn-based tactics game where squads of goofy characters duke it out for dominance.

While the wizard is flinging spells and the swordsman slashes, the jester throws his custard pies and the robotic stalker waits for its chance to pounce! Let loose in this melting pot of madness!

  • Limited number of actions shared across the whole team. How will you spend your actions?
  • Wide variety of goofy and unusual characters fighting across grid-based battlefields.
  • Rock-Paper-Scissors elements attached to techniques and characters to weigh decisions.
  • Silly story about a group of friends on a quest for glory.
  • Challenge mode where you create your squad and take on predefined battlefields.
  • Local skirmish mode with multiple teams, customisable winning conditions atop randomly generated or preset maps.
  • Inbuilt editors that let you create your own units, maps and campaigns!
